thread.title: All the looks from the 2017 Grammys red carpet
thread.title_full: All the looks from the 2017 Grammys red carpet

author: Lili Sams
title: All the looks from the 2017 Grammys red carpet
text:
All the looks from the 2017 Grammys red carpet 197 By Lili Sams, Tricia Gilbride and Laura Vitto 2017-02-13 00:17:15 UTC 
Lady Gaga probably won't show up in an egg , but things are still bound to get interesting when the music industry's A-list shows up for the 2017 Grammys. 
Come for Girl Crush's (who?) out-of-control ball pit gown and stay for Adele's signature cat eye. 
Image: Frazer Harrison/Getty
